mapper.insert: insert into t_customer_billing(id, project_id, invoice_code, invoice_type, amount, trice, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description, status) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{invoiceCode}, #{invoiceType}, #{amount}, #{trice}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update t_customer_billing set project_id = #{projectId}, invoice_code = #{invoiceCode}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, amount = #{amount}, trice = #{trice}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, project_id as projectId, invoice_code as invoiceCode, invoice_type as invoiceType, amount as amount, trice as trice, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, status as status from t_customer_billing where id = #{id}
select version from t_customer_billing where id = #{id}
